sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_gear"> <x_176383_star_wars_gear action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <base_damage>0</base_damage> <critical_rating/> <defense/> <description>Full body armor can be designed to be sealed against a vacuum, allowing the user to operate in space. This modification provides the armor with enough air and insulation to survive for up to 10 minutes, and obviously also protects against adverse atmospheric environments. This can only be applied to laminate or battle armor. Models Include: Numerous Variants. Base Modifiers: Allows the user to ignore the effects of vacuum or poisonous atmospheric environments for up to 10 minutes. Modification Options: None.</description> <encumbrance/> <hard_points/> <hp_required>1</hp_required> <name>Vacuum Sealed</name> <number>GEAR0001167</number> <price>1000</price> <range/> <rarity>3</rarity> <skill_used/> <soak/> <sys_class_name/> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-19 04:53:59</sys_created_on> <sys_id>227e7b7d2fa42c90e0f497eef699b6c3</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-11-19 04:53:59</sys_updated_on> <type>mod</type> </x_176383_star_wars_gear> </record_update>
